title: Trash Folder
content: Out of the blue, when I delete a message, it doesn't show up in my Trash Folder..? Never happened before, any clues on what's caused it...? Cheers, Ron.
creator: rjlj

title: junk emails
content: why am i losing the correspondent field on some junk emails
creator: nben4

title: Can't open email
content:
When I click on the shortcut this popup comes up. Thunderbird is already running, but is not responding. The old Thunderbird process must be closed to open a new window. I close it and it does it again. 

You can send the the answer to  pedersonted@gmail.com This email doesn't work.  Thank you, Ted
creator: phyte

title: Emails are not received and quaranteened on a new version 115 but work well on 102.15.1
content: Ever since the update to 115.8 I have not been able to send emails to a hospital since it Quaranteens emails at the server lever sent from thunderbird and they are not received by the recipient. I have downgraded to version 102.15.1 and the emails go through
creator: a70

title: automatický posun zpráv
content: Zdravím, uměl by někdo pomoci - mám nastaveno stahovat pouze hlavičky zpráv. Po dotažení vybrané zprávy mi nezůstane tato vybraná, ale automaticky se mi přesune výběr na další zprávu. Při stahování 40 mailů najedou je to velmi nepříjemná funkce. Děkuji Tom
creator: kresina1
